message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $180. I believe it offers a lot of value at this price.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $100. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $150. This item is in high demand, and I believe this is a fair price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your understanding, but $150 is still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $130. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
